native_settings_general_autopilot_speed_: Adjust the AutoPilot speed level. The slower the speed, the lower the speed, and the faster the speed, the higher the automatic flight.
native_settings_general_landing_vfx_desc: Enable projection mapping on the ground. (Atlus and Surveyor only)
native_settings_general_activation_descr: Add an item to enable and disable Aerial Vehicles without Virtual Car Dealer.
native_settings_keybinds_move_up_descrip: Hold on this to move the AV up.
native_settings_keybinds_move_down_descr: Hold on this to move the AV down.
native_settings_keybinds_move_left_descr: Hold on this to move the AV left.
native_settings_keybinds_move_right_desc: Hold on this to move the AV right.
native_settings_keybinds_lean_reset_desc: Hold on this to reset the AV's tilt.
native_settings_keybinds_ascend_descript: Hold on this to ascend the Helicopter.
native_settings_keybinds_descend_descrip: Hold on this to descend the Helicopter.
native_settings_keybinds_turn_left_descr: Hold on this to turn the Helicopter left.
native_settings_keybinds_turn_right_desc: Hold on this to turn the Helicopter right.
native_settings_keybinds_acceleration_de: Hold on this to accelerate the Helicopter forward.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_autopilo: Press this to open the autopilot setting screen. Press and hold to start Autopilot. Pressing this button during Autopilot will interrupt it.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_door_des: You can operate the opening and closing of the door.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_radio_de: Switches the radio ON/OFF. If you press and hold it for a while before releasing, the radio port will open.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_crystal_: Switches the crystal dome ON/OFF. Exclusive to Excalibur and Manticore.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_appearan: Switches the appearance of the AV.
native_settings_keybinds_open_vehicle_ma: Opens a vehicle list popup in a safety zone or other location where normal vehicle calls are restricted.
native_settings_advance_horizontal_air_r: The larger the value, the more resistance it has when moving Forward.
native_settings_advance_vertical_air_res: The larger the value, the more resistance it has when moving up and down.
native_settings_advance_acceleration_des: The larger the value, the faster it can move forward and backward.
native_settings_advance_vertical_acceler: The larger the value, the faster it can move up and down.
native_settings_advance_left_right_accel: The larger the value, the faster it can move left and right.
native_settings_advance_roll_change_amou: Angular Acceleration in the Roll Direction
Angular acceleration in the roll direction tilting when moving in the left/right direction.
native_settings_advance_roll_restore_amo: The higher the value, the greater the force that causes the AV to return to horizontal.
native_settings_advance_pitch_change_amo: Angular Acceleration in the Pitch Direction
Angular acceleration in the pitch direction tilting when moving in the front/back direction.
native_settings_advance_pitch_restore_am: The higher the value, the greater the force that causes the AV to return to horizontal.
native_settings_advance_yaw_change_amoun: Angular Acceleration in the Yaw Direction
Angular acceleration in the yaw direction when turning left and right.
native_settings_advance_rotate_roll_chan: Angular Acceleration in the Roll Direction when Rotating
Angular acceleration in the roll direction when rotating the AV.
native_settings_advance_h_roll_change_am: Angular Acceleration in the Roll Direction
Angular acceleration in the roll direction tilting when moving in the left/right direction.
native_settings_advance_h_roll_restore_a: The higher the value, the greater the force that causes the AV to return to horizontal.
native_settings_advance_h_pitch_change_a: Angular Acceleration in the Pitch Direction
Angular acceleration in the pitch direction tilting when moving in the front/back direction.
native_settings_advance_h_pitch_restore_: The higher the value, the greater the force that causes the AV to return to horizontal.
native_settings_advance_h_yaw_change_amo: Angular Acceleration in the Yaw Direction
Angular acceleration in the yaw direction when turning left and right.
native_settings_advance_h_acceleration_d: The larger the value, the faster it can move Forward.
native_settings_advance_h_lift_idle_acce: Lift force when not upward or downward
native_settings_advance_h_ascend_acceler: The larger the value, the faster it can move Upward.
native_settings_advance_h_descend_accele: The larger the value, the faster it can move Downward.
native_settings_common_flight_mode_descr: Setting items for the selected vehicle type will be displayed.
ui_popup_footer: Choose your Autopilot destination from the current map pin location or your favorite locations.
ui_popup_register_confirm_text: Overwrites the current location with the favorite location of the specified number. Are you sure?
